title: Spacious rental with two offices, great for teleworking
description:
Charming and spacious one bedroom apartment with two upstairs offices in attractive 100 year old home in Wilmington’s Triangle District.  Perfect location for teleworking, or walking distance to Wilmington Hospital, Incyte and downtown Wilmington.  Across the street from Brandywine Park and a rails-to-trails for miles of uninterrupted walking/biking.  Walk to restaurants, coffee shops, brewery and an independent theater.
The apartment is very large consisting of the entire second and third floors of the home. Features hardwood floors and large open floor plan living and dining. There is a second floor three-season porch/sunroom perfect for dining or reading a novel on the weekends overlooking a small back native plant garden.  Separate entrance, with quaint front porch shared with one other tenant.  Free use of washer and dryer shared with one other tenant in well-lit basement.  Additional storage space available in basement.  High efficiency gas heater for inexpensive and comforting radiator heat.  A/C units provided and ceiling fans throughout apartment.
House is thoughtfully landscaped with native plants.  Lovely large trees in back garden.
Plenty of street parking directly in front of apartment on a low-use, residential one-way street.
Location details:
Nestled in the Triangle neighborhood of Wilmington, Delaware on a quiet, one-way residential street. Across the street from Brandywine Park with access to walking trails along Brandywine River.  Walking distance to Wilmington’s downtown central business district, restaurants, coffee shop and Theatre N (an independent movie theater).
Triangle District is very quiet and known for its friendly neighbors.  Lovely large trees in the back of house.

title: 2 Bedroom 1 Bath 900 SF single house
description:
I DO NOT REPLY TO "I WANT TO TAKE A TOUR" MESSAGES!  Send me a message with some basic information about you and your family, I will get back to you.
NO PETS!
Available August 1, 2022 is this cozy 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom single family house for rent in downtown Palmerton, PA, zip code 18071. The house has about 900 SF of interior area, a small front entry porch, and a small attached deck at the back entrance. The tenant has the use of a 16 x16 elevated deck which is directly behind the house, which has an amazing view of the Blue Mountains and the Appalachian Trail and a gas grill. This deck is shared space. The house was fully remodeled 7 years ago or so, and everything is in excellent shape. All the major appliances are included, such as washer/dryer, air conditioner which is built into the wall, refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave, and electric range. Water/sewer/trash is paid by the owner, and the tenant pays electric and cable/internet, and landline phone if needed. The heat is electric baseboard, so there is no oil or gas bill to worry about. 1 off street parking space is included, with a second space available for a small car at $75 per month in addition to the base rent. There are also spaces in the street if necessary. There are lots of stairs, and the parking area is not directly in front of the house, so if you are mobility impaired please keep that in mind. It is a good vibe in an inclusive community where everyone pitches in and gets along. The property includes a 3 acre mountain side covered with boulders and trees, which you can explore and enjoy to your heart's content. You are walking distance to the Palmerton Park, and to all of downtown Palmerton. Owner lives next door. The house is located very near the entrance to Palmerton from route 248. It is less than 15 minutes to the new St. Luke's Carbon Hospital Campus, and about the same distance to the new Lehigh Valley Hospital which is opening soon in Lehighton. It is about 10 minutes to the entrance to Route 476, the Pennsylvania turnpike, if you need to access that regularly. To get to the house you take the route 248 exit into Palmerton, you would then make the first left onto Mauch Chunk Road, and the house is located about 1/4 mile on the right side. The only outside work you need to do is snow removal during the winters, since the owner takes care of all spring/summer/fall exterior maintenance.
The owner is an experienced landlord and only accept tenants who can pass the screening process with ease. Requirements are as follows: - Gross pay of 3 times the monthly rent (combined if applying jointly) - 3 months of pay stubs (proof of income) - Phone number of immediate supervisor to verify employment - Full Credit report (score is not necessary) - Criminal Background Check and eviction report - If available, phone numbers of previous landlords and copies of previous leases. - If no previous landlords are available, then 2 personal references who are not family members. Send me a message about yourself, and I will get back to you. I do not answer messages about "taking a tour".

title: No lease. Weekly rates starting at $560.
description:
A budget-friendly extended stay hotel in Bethlehem, PA
We invite you to experience the conveniences of home at WoodSpring Suites® Allentown Bethlehem. Our all-suite hotel with in-room kitchens is the perfect choice for your extended stay, whether it’s for a week, a month, or longer. We offer low nightly, weekly, and monthly hotel rates to help save you money. Plus, you'll enjoy free WiFi, guest laundry facilities and free parking at our 100% smoke-free, pet-friendly property, making your stay simple and hassle-free.
You'll enjoy quick access to a variety of destinations and attractions when you stay at our hotel in Bethlehem, Pennsylvania. If you’d like to take advantage of public transportation, we're right on the 108, 217, 319, and 327 local LANta bus routes, while the Amtrak Bus Station is just 6 miles away. We're about 8 miles from the Lehigh Valley International Airport/ABE Airport. $50 to $100 Deposit.
Hotel at a Glance
5 miles to Lehigh Valley Hospital Muhlenberg
6 miles to St. Luke’s Hospital Anderson Campus
6 miles to Greyhound and Amtrak stations
8 miles to Lehigh Valley International Airport
Nightly, weekly and monthly hotel rates
Full kitchen in every room
Guest Rooms
Visit our extended stay hotel and select the suite layout that meets your needs. Each layout features a combination of double-/full-sized beds and sleeper sofas, as well as a dresser, nightstand and shelves. All suites also include a kitchen with full-size refrigerator, stovetop, microwave, cupboards and prep sink. Sit back and relax during your stay while enjoying free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with cable/satellite and a premium movie channel. Every-other-week housekeeping services are provided for long-stay guests. Additional items—including a linen exchange, cookware, dishes, and more frequent housekeeping—are available for purchase at the front desk.
Explore activities for all ages in Allentown Bethlehem
You're in the heart of it all when you stay at WoodSpring Suites in Allentown Bethlehem, where you'll find a variety of exciting attractions and destinations. History buffs will enjoy visiting the nearby Pennsbury Manor, the reconstructed estate of William Penn, who founded the Pennsylvania colony. We're also an easy drive to a number of family friendly activities, including Crayola Experience, Dorney Park and Wildwater Kingdom, and Lehigh Valley Zoo. Artists and creative types will want to check out the Banana Factory Arts Center, a collection of galleries and arts programs partly housed in a former banana distribution warehouse, about 9 miles away.
Show Less
Pet Policy
Service animals are welcome at no additional charge, must be registered at front desk. Limit 2 dogs, under 75 lbs. per room. No cats. Non-refundable pet fees, 50 USD a pet reg fee and 10 USD a pet per night charge for the duration of the stay.
Hotel Alert: Some hotel features and amenities may be modified or unavailable due to COVID-19. For more information, please call your hotel directly.
Amenities to help you stay awhile
WoodSpring Suites is an extended stay hotel with clean and comfortable rooms, and a professional, friendly staff that’s available to assist you 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Our 100% smoke-free hotel offers pet-friendly hotel rooms, free parking, guest laundry facilities and conveniently located vending machines. Daily, weekly and monthly hotel rates are available.
